task.title: Reorder the login module
task.shortdesc: Reorder the login module for the DEFAULT, WEB_INBOUND, and RMI_INBOUND aliases.

step.cmd: Expand Java Authentication and Authorization Service in the Authentication section and select System logins.
Select the relevant Alias from the list. Reorder the login module for the DEFAULT, WEB_INBOUND, and RMI_INBOUND aliases as follows:

substep.cmd: Select curam.util.security.CuramLoginModule and select Move Up. Repeat this until the CuramLoginModule entry is the top entry in the list

step.cmd: Select OK to confirm the modifications to the order.
